channel.title: Research paper!
channel.description:
TOPIC:
historical events have a way of impacting the lives of everyone. DIscuss the 3 most important events of the 20th century and explain why each one is important....
directions:
create a research paper. there must be a minimum of 3 sources. 2 of the 3 must be books.
there must be a title page
there must be parenthetical refrences. there must be a work cited page the paper must be in the MLA format
THESIS:the most important events of th 20th century are_____________________

lmao my gf told me bout those… thx any way man… Damn summer school man … -.- wut i get for playin rs gettin 99 fletch 74 minin and 82 c -.-

Haha, man that’s awesome. But seriously, don’t let RS ruin your life. I know it’s hard, but think about 50 years from now, you’ll be working as a janitor, pissed because you could have done something with your life. But w/e, good luck with that paper.
